name: Feed the Frosty Frogs
description:
During the winter the frogs are unable to get their own food.

You must help them get their food. Solve the puzzles by pushing the iceblocks into the mouths of the frogs.

Good luck!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - moving
  • spacebar - push iceblock  / start game
  • R - restart level

This game was made for the seventh GBJAM by KingKelpo and Ice Rebel. Deluxe version coming soon!
